Plot: In the summer of 1987, a college graduate takes a 'nowhere' job at his local amusement park, only to find it's the perfect course to get him prepared for the real world.
Title: Adventureland
Actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Kelsey Ford, Michael Zegen, Ryan McFarland
tomatoConsensus: Full of humor and nostalgia, Adventureland is a sweet, insightful coming-of-age comedy that will resonate with teens and adults alike.
